description: Creates an Amazon S3 Tables table bucket in the same AWS Region where you create the AWS CloudFormation stack.

Tags.description: User tags (key-value pairs) to associate with the table bucket.
Tags.markdownDescription:
User tags (key-value pairs) to associate with the table bucket.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

TableBucketARN.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified table bucket.
TableBucketARN.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified table bucket.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

TableBucketName.description: A name for the table bucket.
TableBucketName.markdownDescription:
A name for the table bucket.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 3  
Maximum Length: 63  
Update requires: No interruption

UnreferencedFileRemoval.description: Settings governing the Unreferenced File Removal maintenance action. Unreferenced file removal identifies and deletes all objects that are not referenced by any table snapshots.

Status.description: Indicates whether the Unreferenced File Removal maintenance action is enabled.
Status.markdownDescription:
Indicates whether the Unreferenced File Removal maintenance action is enabled.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: Enabled | Disabled  
Update requires: No interruption

UnreferencedDays.description: For any object not referenced by your table and older than the UnreferencedDays property, S3 creates a delete marker and marks the object version as noncurrent.
UnreferencedDays.markdownDescription:
For any object not referenced by your table and older than the UnreferencedDays property, S3 creates a delete marker and marks the object version as noncurrent.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

NoncurrentDays.description: S3 permanently deletes noncurrent objects after the number of days specified by the NoncurrentDays property.
NoncurrentDays.markdownDescription:
S3 permanently deletes noncurrent objects after the number of days specified by the NoncurrentDays property.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

UnreferencedFileRemoval.markdownDescription:
Settings governing the Unreferenced File Removal maintenance action. Unreferenced file removal identifies and deletes all objects that are not referenced by any table snapshots.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

EncryptionConfiguration.description: Specifies encryption settings for the table bucket

SSEAlgorithm.markdownDescription:
Server-side encryption algorithm

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: AES256 | aws:kms  
Update requires: No interruption

KMSKeyArn.description: ARN of the KMS key to use for encryption
KMSKeyArn.markdownDescription:
ARN of the KMS key to use for encryption

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

EncryptionConfiguration.markdownDescription:
Specifies encryption settings for the table bucket

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

MetricsConfiguration.description: Settings governing the Metric configuration for the table bucket.

Status.markdownDescription:
Indicates whether Metrics are enabled.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: Enabled | Disabled  
Update requires: No interruption

MetricsConfiguration.markdownDescription:
Settings governing the Metric configuration for the table bucket.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

StorageClassConfiguration.description: Specifies storage class settings for the table bucket

StorageClass.description: The storage class for the table bucket
StorageClass.markdownDescription:
The storage class for the table bucket

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: STANDARD | INTELLIGENT_TIERING  
Update requires: No interruption

StorageClassConfiguration.markdownDescription:
Specifies storage class settings for the table bucket

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Key.description: Tag key must be between 1 to 128 characters in length. Tag key cannot start with 'aws:' and can only contain alphanumeric characters, spaces, _, ., /, =, +, -, and @.
Key.markdownDescription:
Tag key must be between 1 to 128 characters in length. Tag key cannot start with 'aws:' and can only contain alphanumeric characters, spaces, _, ., /, =, +, -, and @.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: Tag value must be between 0 to 256 characters in length. Tag value can only contain alphanumeric characters, spaces, _, ., /, =, +, -, and @.
Value.markdownDescription:
Tag value must be between 0 to 256 characters in length. Tag value can only contain alphanumeric characters, spaces, _, ., /, =, +, -, and @.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption
